TypeSignature.Value: .class nested public auto ansi sealed Environment/SpecialFolder extends System.Enum

summary.span: 指定用于检索系统特殊文件夹的目录路径的枚举常数。

span.span: Specifies enumerated constants used to retrieve directory paths to system special folders.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 系统特殊文件夹是文件夹，如**Program Files**，**程序**，**系统**，或**启动**，其中包含常见信息。The system special folders are folders such as **Program Files**, **Programs**, **System**, or **Startup**, which contain common information. 特殊文件夹时设置的默认系统，或显式由用户安装的 Windows 版本。Special folders are set by default by the system, or explicitly by the user, when installing a version of Windows. 方法返回此枚举与关联的位置。The method returns the locations associated with this enumeration. 这些文件夹的位置可以具有不同的值在不同操作系统上，用户可以更改某些位置，并位置已经进行了本地化。The locations of these folders can have different values on different operating systems, the user can change some of the locations, and the locations are localized. 有关特殊文件夹的详细信息，请参阅[KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) Windows 文档中的常量。For more information about special folders, see the [KNOWNFOLDERID](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/dd378457.aspx) constants in the Windows documentation. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用与方法以获取系统目录。The following example shows how to use with the method to get the System directory. [!code-cpp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CPP/getfolderpath.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/CS/getfolderpath.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Environment.GetFolderPath#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR/Environment.GetFolderPath/VB/getfolderpath.vb#1)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder AdminTools = int32(48)

summary.span: 用于存储各个用户的管理工具的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that is used to store administrative tools for an individual user.

summary.span: Microsoft Management Console (MMC) 会将自定义的控制台保存在此目录中，并且此目录将随用户一起漫游。

span.span: The Microsoft Management Console (MMC) will save customized consoles to this directory, and it will roam with the user.

summary.span: 已在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中添加。

span.span: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder ApplicationData = int32(26)

summary.span: 用作当前漫游用户的应用程序特定数据的公共储存库的目录。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data for the current roaming user.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 漫游用户在网络上的多个计算机上工作。A roaming user works on more than one computer on a network. 漫游用户配置文件保存在网络上的服务器上，并且在用户登录时加载到系统。A roaming user's profile is kept on a server on the network and is loaded onto a system when the user logs on.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CDBurning = int32(59)

summary.span: 充当等待写入 CD 的文件的临时区域的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that acts as a staging area for files waiting to be written to a CD.

summary.span: 已在 [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)] 中添加。

span.span: Added in the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)].

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonAdminTools = int32(47)

summary.span: 包含计算机所有用户的管理工具的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that contains administrative tools for all users of the computer.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonApplicationData = int32(35)

summary.span: 用作所有用户使用的应用程序特定数据的公共储存库的目录。

span.span: The directory that serves as a common repository for application-specific data that is used by all users.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder CommonDesktopDirectory = int32(25)

summary.span: 包含在所有用户桌面上出现的文件和文件夹的文件系统目录。

span.span: The file system directory that contains files and folders that appear on the desktop for all users.

summary.span: 此特殊文件夹仅对 Windows NT 系统有效。

span.span: This special folder is valid only for Windows NT systems.

span.span: The file system directory that contains documents that are common to all users.

summary.span: 此特殊文件夹仅对装有 Shfolder.dll 的 Windows NT 系统、Windows 95 和 Windows 98 系统有效。

span.span: This special folder is valid for Windows NT systems, Windows 95, and Windows 98 systems with Shfolder.dll installed.

span.span: The logical Desktop rather than the physical file system location.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder DesktopDirectory = int32(16)

summary.span: 用于物理上存储桌面上的文件对象的目录。

span.span: The directory used to physically store file objects on the desktop.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不要混淆此目录与桌面文件夹本身，这是虚拟文件夹。Do not confuse this directory with the desktop folder itself, which is a virtual folder.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Environment/SpecialFolder MyComputer = int32(17)

summary.span: “我的计算机”文件夹。

span.span: The **My Computer** folder.

remarks.format: ## Remarks MyComputer 常数将始终生成空字符串 ("") 因为没有路径定义为我的电脑文件夹。The MyComputer constant always yields the empty string ("") because no path is defined for the My Computer folder.

summary.span: “我的文档”文件夹。

summary.span: 应用程序不应在此级别上创建文件或文件夹；它们应将其数据放在 所引用的位置之下。
